lines.gurmukhi: KwNf KwNf khY ijhbw n s√çwdu mITo AwvY Agin Agin khY sIq n ibnws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Khaand Khaand Kahai Jihabaa N Svaadu Meettho Aavai , Agani Agani Kahai Seet N Binaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: No action but repeated utterances are futile. Repeatedly saying sugar, the tongue is unable to experience sweet taste, nor shivering with cold can stop by saying fire! fire!

lines.gurmukhi: bYd bYd khY rog imtq n kwhU ko drb drb khY koaU drbih n iblws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Baid Baid Kahai Rog Mitat N Kaahoo Ko , Darab Darab Kahai Kooo Darabahi N Bilaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: No ailment can be cured by repeated utterance of doctor! doctor! nor can anyone enjoy the luxuries that money buys just by saying money! money!

lines.gurmukhi: cMdn cMdn khq pRgtY n subwsu bwsu cMdR cMdR khY aujIAwro n pRgws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Chandan Chandan Kahat Pragatai N Soubaasu Baasu , Chandr Chandr Kahai Ujeeaaro N Pragaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as saying sandalwood! sandalwood, the fragrance of sandalwood cannot spread, nor can the radiance of the moon-light be experienced by repeatedly saying moon! moon! unless the moon rises.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy igAwn gosit khq n rhq pwvY krnI pRDwn Bwn audiq Akws hY ]437]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Giaan Gosati Kahat N Rahat Paavai , Karanee Pradhaan Bhaan Udati Akaas Hai ?437?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly, just listening to the holy sermons and discourses, no one can acquire the divine life-style and code of conduct. The most fundamental need is to practice the lessons in actual life. So by the practice of the Guru's blessed Naam Simran, the ligh
